data.title: Youth4Jobs Foundation on LinkedIn: #brailleday #brailleempowers #accesstoinformation #inclusivecommunication…
data.meta_description: Braille has opened up a world of possibilities for those who may have otherwise been limited in their access to information and communication. Let's celebrate…
data.text:
In the classic tale of the dog and the rabbit, it's not just about who has longer legs or greater physical abilities. The underlying lesson lies in the motivations driving their actions. The dog, with its longer legs and presumably greater speed, runs in pursuit of the rabbit. However, the rabbit, despite its comparative disadvantage in terms of speed, is driven by an entirely different purpose: self-preservation. While the dog is chasing the rabbit for the benefit of its owner, the rabbit is running solely to protect itself. This narrative illustrates a broader lesson about motivation and purpose. It suggests that when we act solely for the benefit of others, without considering our own well-being or interests, we may ultimately find ourselves at a disadvantage. The dog's loss in the race symbolizes the potential outcome of prioritizing others' goals over our own. The key takeaway is the importance of advocating for our own rights and interests. Like the rabbit, we must learn to fight for ourselves, not solely for the benefit of others. By doing so, we empower ourselves and ensure that our actions align with our own goals and aspirations. #ownrights #advocacy #rights #goals #empower #motivation

Worrying about how to safeguard the future for our loved ones who are vulnerable (physically, mentally or emotionally) keeps me up at night. A huge thank you for the team from #actionforpeople - Lisa Duffy, Helen Connolly and Meredith Coote for educating carers about advocacy and creating such an informative, useful and collaborative program on supported decision making. I look forward to the next workshop in this valuable series: https://lnkd.in/gw3wBYuU

Feeling lost in a maze of trucking regulations? Don't worry, NAPTA is here to be your GPS! This sign might just have a few boxes to tick, but NAPTA offers a whole roadmap to success in the trucking industry. From industry education and advocacy to fostering collaboration and building a brighter future, NAPTA checks all the boxes to help you elevate your business. So, invest in your success and join NAPTA today! . #NAPTAstrong #PunjabiTrucking #Community #Advocacy #Progress #TruckerLife #CDL #FuelSavings #BusinessGrowth P.S. Share this post with your fellow Punjabi truckers and let's build an unstoppable community!

At NMIC, we believe that advocacy is the spark that ignites change. It's not just a word; it's a powerful force that can transform lives. But what exactly is advocacy, and why does it matter? Let's explore the impact together. Here at NMIC, advocacy is the proactive defense of your rights, your family's rights, and your community's rights. It's the skill to amplify your voice, effecting significant change in your daily life and beyond, transforming our clients' experiences in remarkable ways. As GivingTuesday approaches, we invite you to join this transformative journey: bit.ly/nmicnyc #givingtuesday
